house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1996 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener,Pantry, Storage Space
